## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nlme)
library(lme4)
library(ggpubr)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

## Load data

```{r}
library(readxl)
dat<- read_xlsx("~/Red girasol AAPRESID/red_AAPRESID/imput/data/Base_general_Girasol_names.xlsx")
```

## Filter

```{r}
#campaña
campana<- c("2023/24")

dat_1<-dat %>% filter( Año %in% campana)

#sitio
site<- c("Necochea")

dat_2<-dat_1 %>% filter( Sitio %in% site)
```

## Plot

```{r}
ggplot()+
    geom_point(data = dat_2,
               aes(x= hibrido,
                   y= Rendimiento,
                   color= hibrido))
```
